RelationUs.comment: Has this SubjectRelationship with the Player.

RelationLeader.comment: Has this SubjectRelationship with the Leader.

NoRelationLeader.comment: Doesn't have this SubjectRelationship with the Leader.

Resource.comment: Is or Tile has this Resource.

Character.comment: Is this Character (automatically created for Events).

MemoryPlayerInvalid.comment: Player does not have this Memory.

MemoryTribeInvalid.comment: Tribe does not have this Memory.

MemoryReligionInvalid.comment: Religion does not have this Memory.

MemoryFamilyInvalid.comment: Family does not have this Memory.

MemoryCharacterInvalid.comment: Character does not have this Memory.

HasFamilyClass.comment: Player has one of these Family Classes.

FamilyClassPrereq.comment: Family FamilyClass required for this Subject or this Subject’s Family.

GenderPrereq.comment: Required gender for this Character Subject.

CouncilPrereq.comment: Council Member that this Character Subject must be.

CourtierPrereq.comment: Courtier that this Character Subject must be.

TraitNone.comment: Player Subject has no Characters with this Trait.

TraitPrereq.comment: Trait required for this Character Subject.

TraitInvalid.comment: Trait that this Character Subject must not have.

ProjectPrereq.comment: Project that must be present in this City.

iTileID.comment: The Tile Subject must have this ID (useful for Scenarios).

iMinPlayerWars.comment: The Player Subject must have at least this many wars with other Players.

iMaxPlayerWars.comment: The Player Subject must have at most this many wars with other Players.

iMinDiplomacyTurns.comment: Current Diplomacy state has at least this many turns.

iMaxDiplomacyTurns.comment: Current Diplomacy state has at most this many turns.

iMinTotalWarScore.comment: Minimum Total War Score with Player (will not work for Tribes).

iMaxTotalWarScore.comment: Maximum Total War Score with Player (will not work for Tribes).

iMinCamps.comment: Tribe has at least this many settlements.

iMaxCamps.comment: Tribe has at most this many settlements.

iMinDiscontentLevel.comment: Minimum discontent level this City Subject must have.

iMinDamagePercent.comment: City has at least this much Damage.

iMinAge.comment: Minimum age of this Character Subject.

iMaxAge.comment: Maximum age of this Character Subject.

iMinCourtiers.comment: Player has at least this many Courtiers.

iMaxCourtiers.comment: Player has at most this many Courtiers.

iMaxHeirs.comment: Maximum number of heirs permitted for this player Subject.

bIgnoreRandom.comment: Always chooses the first valid Subject.

bIsUs.comment: The player Subject must be the same as the player getting the event.

bIsNotUs.comment: The player Subject must be different from the player getting the event.

bIsUsOrThem.comment: The player Subject must be different from the player getting the event.

bIsSameTeam.comment: The player Subject must be different from the player getting the event but on the same team.

bIsDiffTeam.comment: The player Subject must be on a different team.

bContactBoth.comment: This player Subject has contacted us and vice-versa.

bNoContact.comment: This player Subject must not have been contacted.

bHuman.comment: This player Subject must be human. If false, must not be an AI. (This value is only tested if either bIsUs, bIsNotUs, or bIsUsOrThem is true.)

bHasPlayer.comment: This Subject must belong to a Player.

bNoPlayer.comment: This Subject must be Tribe and NOT belong to a Player.

bPlayToWinVs.comment: This player Subject is the human and is close to winning.

bHighestVP.comment: This player Subject has the most VPs.

bHasHeirs.comment: This player Subject must have at least 1 valid heir.

bHasNoHeirs.comment: This player Subject must have no heirs at all.

bNoStateReligion.comment: Does not have a State Religion.

bCapital.comment: This Subject must be the capital, or the governor of the capital.

bAgentNetwork.comment: This Subject City must have an Agent Network.

bNewestCity.comment: This Subject is the City that this player founded most recently.

bPaganReligion.comment: This Subject is a Pagan Religion.

bWorldReligion.comment: This Subject is a World Religion.

bUnlockedReligion.comment: This Subject can be made a State Religion.

bNoTribeReligion.comment: Tribe does not have a Religion.

bNoFamilyReligion.comment: Family does not have a Religion.

bNoCharacterReligion.comment: Character does not have a Religion.

bDead.comment: The Character Subject must be dead. Note: Normally being dead disqualifies the Character from being a Subject; setting this entry to true overrides this disqualification. (This value is only tested if either bIsUs, bIsNotUs, or bIsUsOrThem is true.)

bNotMe.comment: This Subject is not our Leader.

bWasLeader.comment: This Subject must be or have been the Leader.

bLeader.comment: This Subject must be the Leader.

bNonLeader.comment: This Subject must not be the Leader.

bNoRelationLeader.comment: This Subject does not have a Relationship with the Leader.

bLeaderOrDescendant.comment: Is the Leader or descendant of the Leader.

bHeir.comment: This Subject must be the direct heir, or the Family of the direct heir.

bNonHeir.comment: This Subject cannot be the direct heir, nor the Family of the direct heir.

bSuccession.comment: This Subject must be somewhere in the line of succession.

bNonSuccession.comment: This Subject cannot be anywhere in the line of succession.

bGenderHeirValid.comment: This Subject can be the Leader based on gender rules for succession.

bCouncil.comment: This Subject must be on the council.

bGovernor.comment: This Subject must be a governor.

bAgent.comment: This Subject must be an agent.

bGeneral.comment: This Character Subject must be a general.

bNonGeneral.comment: This Character Subject must not be a general.

bHasJob.comment: This Character Subject is a general, governor, agent, or on the council.

bNoJob.comment: This Character Subject is not a general, governor, agent, or on the council.

bRoyal.comment: This Character Subject must be royal, meaning descended from the original ruler.

bNonRoyal.comment: This Character Subject must not be royal.

bRoyalSpouse.comment: This Character Subject’s spouse must be royal.

bCourtier.comment: This Character Subject must be a Courtier.

bNonCourtier.comment: This Character Subject must not be a Courtier.

bTutor.comment: This Character Subject must be a Tutor.

bTutorStudent.comment: This Character Subject must be an eligible Tutor Student.

bOfStateReligion.comment: This Character Subject must be of the State Religion.

bReligionHead.comment: This Character Subject must be a Religion Head.

bNonReligionHead.comment: This Character Subject must not be a Religion Head.

bWasReligionHead.comment: This Character Subject was a Religion Head.

bFamilyHead.comment: This Character Subject must be a Family Head.

bNonFamilyHead.comment: This Character Subject must not be a Family Head.

bWasFamilyHead.comment: This Character Subject was a Family Head.

bTribe.comment: This Subject must have a Tribe type

bTribeLeader.comment: This Subject is a Tribe leader

bHasNoSpouse.comment: Character does not have a Spouse.

bHasFamily.comment: This Subject must have a Family associated with it.

bHasNoFamily.comment: This Subject does not have a Family associated with it.

bCanHaveChildren.comment: This Character must be of a fertile age. They must be an adult (at least 18) and no older than 35 (for female Characters) or 60 (for male Characters).

bNoChildren.comment: The Character has no children (any age).

bArchetype.comment: The Character has an Archetype Trait.

bNoArchetype.comment: The Character does not have an Archetype Trait.

bFamilySeat.comment: This City Subject must be a Family seat.

bFamilySeatNo.comment: This City Subject is not a Family seat.

bNeedsGeneral.comment: This Unit can have and does not have a General.

bNoCityTerritory.comment: This Tile does not have an owner.

bFreshWater.comment: This Tile has access to Fresh Water.

bNoFreshWater.comment: This Tile does not have access to Fresh Water.

bCoast.comment: This Tile is on the coast.

bRiver.comment: This Tile is on a river.

bNoResource.comment: This Tile doesn't have a resource.

bNoImprovement.comment: This Tile doesn't have an improvement.

bTribeImprovement.comment: This Tile has a Tribe improvement.

bTribeTerritory.comment: This Tile has a Tribal settlement.

aiMinRating.comment: List of minimum ratings (Leadership, etc.) required for this Subject.

aiMaxRating.comment: List of maximum ratings (Leadership, etc.) required for this Subject.

aeTraitAny.comment: The Character has at least one of these Traits.

aeTraitNone.comment: The Character has none of these Traits.

aeYieldNegative.comment: The Player has a negative rate of this Yield.

Entry.comment: The human user's nation
An AI nation
AI nation at war with the human
Entry.Name: TEXT_SUBJECT_PLAYER_WAR

Entry.comment: Nation only if Heirs exist
Entry.Name: TEXT_SUBJECT_PLAYER_HAS_HEIRS

Entry.comment: Nation with no Heirs
Subjects that check for eliminated players
Subjects that check for a specific Family Class
Subjects regarding Resource amounts
A tribal faction
Tribal faction at War with the human
Entry.Name: TEXT_SUBJECT_TRIBE_PEACE

Entry.comment: A Family within the human's nation
A Character in our nation
Leader of the Human nation
Leader of the Human nation who has a family
Leader whose nation does not have a state religion
Character of human nation with a Family
Heir to the human nation
In line of succession to the human nation
In line of succession to the human nation
Courtier from human nation
Head of a Religion
Entry.Name: TEXT_SUBJECT_RELIGION_HEAD

Entry.comment: Head of a Family
Tribe from human nation
Character from a foreign Nation
A Leader from an AI nation
Leader of an AI nation at War with human
Leader of AI nation non-hostile with human
Leader of AI nation at Peace with human
Heir of an AI nation
In line of succession of an AI nation
Tribe Character not part of any Nation
Leader of a Tribe Tribe
If a leader demanded money ransom
If a leader hid an imprisoned child
If a leader demanded resources ransom
If a leader demanded truce ransom
A City within the human nation
A City within another player nation
A Tribe City (including Anarchy)
A unit belonging to the human nation
A unit belonging to a different nation
Military melee unit
Military mounted unit
Military ranged unit
A tile on the map
Land tile adjacent to salt water
Water tile with Coastal terrain type
